issue.title: nothrow should be inline constexpr rather that extern const

discussion.p: std::nothrow in [new.syn] is declared as 'extern const nothrow_t nothrow;'. Unfortunately this declaration requires linking with Standard Library (which does not work well on GCC with -nostdlib flag). Moreover the declaration differs from other Standard Library tags that are 'inline constexpr'.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4741.

blockquote.pre: struct nothrow_t { explicit nothrow_t() = default; }; extern constinline constexpr nothrow_t nothrow;
